projet_techno_l3.imageeditor.ImageModifications

Class SketchFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.String,android.graphics.Bitmap>
      • projet_techno_l3.imageeditor.ImageModifications.AbstractImageModificationAsyncTask
        • projet_techno_l3.imageeditor.ImageModifications.SketchFilter

  • public class SketchFilter
extends AbstractImageModificationAsyncTask
    Creates a pencil sketch effect on an image (colored or not) by using the colod dodge blend method
